TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compensator extends System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent

summary.span: Rappresenta la classe base di tutti i compensatori CRM (Compensating Resource Manager).

span.span: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks L'utente deve essere esteso da questo oggetto per poter scrivere una transazione personalizzata alla classe Compensator.The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator. Una classe Compensator deve sempre avere un costruttore pubblico. in caso contrario, il motore di ripristino non Ã¨ possibile crearlo.A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it. Per altre informazioni, vedere [procedura: creare un file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029). ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo di questa classe.The following code example demonstrates the use of this class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#20)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#20)] Questa classe compensator viene usata dalla classe ruolo di lavoro seguente.This compensator is used by the following worker class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#10)] Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un client che esercitano il lavoro e alla classe compensator.The following code example demonstrates a client that exercises this compensator and worker. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmclient.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmclient.cs#30)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmclient.vb#30)]
